title: Studio Per Balletto... [Design for Ballet Set] from "Progetti Scenici per 'Sintesi Futuriste'" Portfolio
medium: Color lithograph on heavy white wove paper
description: Multicolored image of complete set with sketchy pastel-colored figures in middle on either side of a triangular form, surrounded by red, orange, blue, yellow large rounded forms.  Curtain suggested in blue-black on all sides except lower eldge.
name: Print
